attributes.additional_details:
H.M. Inspectorate of Constabulary also identify widely varying standards. 
IT'S TIME FOR A FULL PARLIAMENTARY REVIEW OF UK 
  
Our family has three generations of former and serving police but it is reiterated that misconduct towards the public they are supposed to serve – and even towards their own colleagues – can be found nationwide and through all ranks.


Please also feel free to pass the link to others whom you think may also wish to sign
attributes.background:
Violence, racism, homophobia, theft and drugs and sexual assault reported across the UK, including officers targeting their colleagues. 
They are significant minority and affect the integrity of decent officers.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure what you would like a new Police Reform Act to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly how you'd like the law to be changed.

We can't publish personal information, such as your email address, in a petition.
